name: vibe_practice
observations: A modern React 19 application using Vite, focused on DevOps best practices and TDD.
Features a developer journal system with daily entries, weekly statistics, and technical decision tracking.
Uses a chunked, test-driven approach for UI component development (e.g., AddSpiderButton, Rainbow).
Employs a custom font and image assets, with strict aspect ratio and UI/UX guidelines.
Follows a disciplined git workflow with regular, logical commits and detailed documentation.
Implements graceful shutdown and health monitoring for DevOps alignment.
Uses port 8080 for web apps, and is container-friendly.
All journal/statistics entries are markdown, with strict anti-hallucination and data integrity rules.
